description.content:
1. Create an experiment
    
2. Update experiment
    
3. Create a model in experiment
    
4. Create a preprocessing step
    
5. Create a model parameter step (with DL algorithm)
    
6. Create a training step
    
7. Create links between steps
    
8. Run the model
    
9. Change version state to test
    
10. Run a version in a testing state
    
11. Change version state to prod
    
12. Run a version in a production state
    
13. Delete a run
    
14. Delete a model
    
15. Delete an experiment
